clauses.title: Sensitive data is collected and shared to target advertising
clauses.description: Sensitive data refers to information requiring special protection, such as health data, political and religious beliefs, ethnic origins, sexual life and financial information. The service collects and shares this data with third parties for advertising or marketing.
clauses.clause_text: As described in our Privacy Statement, we may use your credit report, credit score, and other information we obtain to analyze, sort, and present certain information or features to you.

case.text: Sensitive data is collected and shared to target advertising

clauses.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text:
Due to our recordkeeping and information retention requirements, we do not delete information about you upon deactivation.
We will, however, disable your account and stop sending you further communications.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: We reserve the right to change this Privacy Policy at any time without notice to you.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: This service tracks you on other websites
clauses.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.
clauses.clause_text: In connection with these advertising services, we or our Advertising Service Providers, like Google Analytics (more on this below) may use cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies to collect behavioral information about how you use our site or other websites in order to perform tracking and marketing analytics or serve advertisements that are more likely to be of interest to you (“Interest-Based Advertisements”).

case.text: This service tracks you on other websites

clauses.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text: These Terms of Service include an agreement to resolve any disputes through binding arbitration that includes a class action waiver, as well as important disclaimers, warranties and limitations on liability.

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text: These Terms of Service include an agreement to resolve any disputes through binding arbitration

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text:
About You

Many of our features rely on information about you that we collect from third parties, such as the free credit reports and credit scores we request on your behalf from TransUnion and Equifax. We may also work with different third party partners to supplement the Usage Information and other information we collect directly from you.

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text:
We and our partners may use various technologies to collect and store Usage Information in connection with our Services.
These may include things like cookies, browser web storage (e.g., HTML5), web beacons and similar technologies.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: We may disclose and transfer information about you to a third party as part of, or in preparation for, a change of control, restructuring, corporate change, or sale or transfer of assets.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text:
We reserve the right to access, use, preserve, transfer or disclose, at any time without notice to you, any information (including Personal Information) as reasonably necessary to:
  • Comply with any applicable law, regulation, subpoena or legal process, or respond to any governmental requests and cooperate with law enforcement, if we believe such action is required or permitted by law;
  • Enforce our Terms of Service, including investigating any potential violations;
  • Protect the safety, integrity, rights or security of our members, our Services or equipment, or any third party. or
  • Detect, prevent or otherwise address fraud, security or technical issues related to our Services or our partners.

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period
clauses.description: The data retention period states how long a service keeps user data. In this case, the service may anonymize the personal data after its retention period is over and use it for analytical or research purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
Furthermore, except to the extent necessary for legal or regulatory recordkeeping purposes, we anonymize the data in your Member Profile two years after you deactivate your account.
It may take a little more time for our automated backup systems to fully process the anonymized account, though.

case.text: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period

clauses.title: Your personal information is used for many different purposes
clauses.description: Personal Data can be processed for many reasons, including non essential processing such as for advertising, marketing and analytics purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
We may share information about you with service providers or agents in order to have them perform on our behalf any of the activities we are permitted to conduct under this Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service.
This includes things like designing or operating features, helping us research and test feature improvements, identifying offers or personalized recommendations, performing analytics and marketing our Services.

case.text: Your personal information is used for many different purposes

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: We may sometimes share information about you with third parties we collaborate with in connection with providing or improving our Services.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
clauses.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.
clauses.clause_text: To put it simply, there are three main ways we collect information about you: when you give it to us, with automatic technologies and when we ask others for it.

case.text: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

clauses.title: The service warns you of the potential consequences related to third-party access
clauses.description: This is different from disclaiming liability for external links, which is handled by the "This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites" case.
clauses.clause_text:
We do not control, maintain, or endorse the Third Party Content or Third Party Services, and we are not responsible or liable for any Third Party Content or Third Party Services, including any damages, losses, failures, or problems caused by, related to, or arising from Third Party Content or Third Party Services.
Your interactions and business dealings with the providers of the Third Party Content or Third Party Services, including products or services offered by such third parties, are solely between you and the third party.

case.text: You are warned of the potential consequences related to third-party access

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We do not sell your Personal Information to or share your Personal Information with unaffiliated third parties for their own advertising or marketing purposes.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: The terms for this service are easy to read and include plain language summaries
clauses.description: The Agreements are well-organised, define legal terms (where applicable), aren't needlessly long and may be pleasant to read.

case.text: The terms for this service are easy to read

clauses.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
clauses.clause_text:
You will defend (if requested by any Credit Karma Party), indemnify, and hold harmless the Credit Karma Parties from and against any and all claims, losses, expenses, demands, or liabilities, including attorneys’ fees and costs, incurred by the Credit Karma Parties in connection with any claim by a third party arising out of or in any way related to: (1) your use of our Services, our Content or the Community Content.
(2) your violation or alleged violation of the Agreement or your violation or alleged violation of any applicable law

case.text: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: Please note that blocking cookies may affect your browsing experience on many sites and may limit your ability to use certain features of our Services, including many of the personalized features we provide for our members.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Effective date: May 21, 2021

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text: We reserve the right in our sole and absolute discretion to make changes to how we operate and provide our Services, including adding new services, modifying existing services, or suspending, discontinuing, or terminating your access to any or all portions of our Services.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text: Do not post User Content that threatens, abuses, harasses or bullies others. Your User Content may not disparage others on the basis of race, ethnicity, national origin, religion, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, military or veteran status, disability, marital status or age.

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: You are 18 years of age or older

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: You are 18 years of age or older

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its Terms of Service does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their Terms of Service.
clauses.clause_text:
We might show you stuff from other companies or even connect you with them, but we’re not legally responsible for anything they do.
You should review their terms and policies separately.

case.text: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties
clauses.description: In this context third-parties refers to anyone including friends, family, or company
clauses.clause_text:
If you decide to register, you’re pinky swearing that you’re a U.S.
adult, you are who you say you are and you won’t let anyone else use your account.</p

case.text: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: We may also share with third parties de-identified or aggregated data we collect, such as de-identified or aggregated credit reports or scores, de-identified demographic information, or information about the computer or device from which you access the Service.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: We do not guarantee that the information we present as part of our Services, including credit report or credit score information, is the same information that may be used or reviewed by a third party to assess your creditworthiness or eligibility for any particular product or service or for employment.

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text:
You must keep your password confidential, you must not share it and you may not allow anyone else to log into our Services as you.
You are responsible for all activities that occur under your member account.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text: At this time, we do not respond to automated signals regarding tracking mechanisms, including “do not track” instructions from your browser.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

clauses.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: I understand that I am providing written instructions in accordance with the Fair Credit Reporting Act and other applicable law for Credit Karma or its affiliated companies to request and receive copies of consumer reports, scores and other information about me from third parties, including, but not limited to, TransUnion and Equifax.

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: Users agree to comply with the law of the service's country
clauses.description: By using the service, you agree to comply with the applicable laws of the service's jurisdiction, regardless of your location.
clauses.clause_text: You must comply with all applicable laws when using our Services.

case.text: You agree to comply with the law of the service's country

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: We may use certain information like your IP address or other Device Information or Log Information to estimate your location (e.g., your city or state). We may also request to use location-enabled services on your device (which typically provide GPS or Wi-Fi access point details) to enhance our Services. We will only use these location-enabled services on your device with your consent, though.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

clauses.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
